title: How to Tie a Persian Tie Knot

steps.headline: Place the tie around your neck.
steps.description: Make sure that the wide end of the tie is a bit longer than the narrow end by a few inches.

steps.headline: Swing the wide end of the tie over the narrow.
Bring the wide end up and through the middle.
Swing the wide end behind the narrow end, from right to left.
Bring the wide end up, then down through the middle to the right.
Swing it around to the front of the tie.
Bring it up through the inside of the loop around your neck.
Pass it down through the loop in front.

text: Place the tie around your neck. Make sure that the wide end of the tie is a bit longer than the narrow end by a few inches. Swing the wide end of the tie over the narrow.  Bring the wide end up and through the middle.  Swing the wide end behind the narrow end, from right to left.  Bring the wide end up, then down through the middle to the right.  Swing it around to the front of the tie.  Bring it up through the inside of the loop around your neck.  Pass it down through the loop in front.  Tighten the knot gently.  Finished.
